definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to collapse/to fall into ruins/death of king or emperor/demise

sentences.english: It is a legend would be a landslide tsunami wave tail.
sentences.chinese: 傳奇它一晃動尾巴就會山崩海嘯。

sentences.english: Getting out of the path of a landslide or debris flow is your best protection.
sentences.chinese: 遠離山崩或土石流的路徑是你最佳的保護。

sentences.english: The northern flank of the mountain collapsed, producing the largest landslide in recorded history.
sentences.chinese: 山峯的北坡坍塌了，這是美國史上最大規模的山崩。

sentences.english: Staying out of the path of a landslide or debris flow saves lives.
sentences.chinese: 遠離山崩或土石流的路徑可以救你一命。

sentences.english: The landslides have steepened the mountain sides.
sentences.chinese: 山崩使山泳的一側變得陡峭了。

sentences.english: This dinosaur was probably buried alive in a landslide that caught it off guard.
sentences.chinese: 這隻恐龍可能是在不注意時被山崩活埋。

sentences.english: A landslide brings down tons of debris.
sentences.chinese: 山崩挾帶下大量的碎岩石。

sentences.english: Cuihua Mountain can be divided into two areas, the Landslide area and the Developed area.
sentences.chinese: 翠華山可分爲兩個地區，山崩景觀區和崩塌形成區。

sentences.english: Landslide ground crack water flow back.
A rock avalanche, or landslide, may be partly an ice avalanche.
sentences.chinese: 巖崩，或叫山崩，可能是冰崩的一部分。

sentences.english: The dammed lake, Shuiqiuchi pool, had been formed when the landslide …
sentences.chinese: 因此，水湫池不可能是唐代的地震山崩形成的。

sentences.english: We will never flinch in the face of earthquake or landslide.
sentences.chinese: 即使山崩地裂，我們決不後退。

sentences.english: Landslides are a common problem when it rains too often.
sentences.chinese: 太常下雨便會有山崩的問題。

definition: heaven falls and earth rends (idiom); rocked by a major disaster/fig. violent revolution/major social upheaval
the earth quaked, the mountains shook (idiom); a tremendous battle
to collapse/to crash down/to fall down in a heap
powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
